column2: Feel - I feel it (i.e. hesitation, shimmy, vibration, or a pull)
column4: Hear - I hear it (i.e. a rattle, a knock, or a squeal)
column5: See - I see it (i.e. oil leak, warning light, or smoke)

column2: Excessive play - Looseness, lack of response in the steering wheel
column4: Hiss - Continuous sound like air escaping

column2: Drifts - Gradual movements to one side

column4: Tap - Light repetitive sound. Louder than a click

column4: Chirp - High pitched rapidly repeating sound, like birds chirping
